name: CHUHAMUSIC
description: Telegram Group Calls streaming bot with some useful features, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls. Supporting platforms like Youtube, Spotify, Resso, AppleMusic, Soundcloud and M3u8 Links.

BOT_TOKEN.description: A Bot's token Get it from @Botfather

EXTRA_PLUGINS.description: if You want to load extra plugins with music plugins so fill (True)  if you don't want to load extra plugins so fill (False)

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a mongodb url from `https://cloud.mongodb.com` . You can leave it blank if you want , bot will use VIP's database for you.

OWNER_ID.description: The user id(s) of user(s) whom you would like to add as a OWNER. Multiple values shall be seperated with a space.

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram String Session. One Assistant is Compulsory.

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Your Log Group Username, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Use only Group. Please don't use Channel ID, Group ID.

AUTO_GCAST.description: 𝐅𝐈𝐋𝐋 𝐇𝐄𝐑𝐄:- [On/Off] 𝐅𝐎𝐑 On/Off 𝐀𝐔𝐓𝐎 𝐆𝐂𝐀𝐒𝐓/𝐁𝐑𝐎𝐀𝐃𝐂𝐀𝐒𝐓 𝐌𝐄𝐒𝐒𝐀𝐆𝐄.

AUTO_GCAST_MSG.description: 𝐅𝐈𝐋𝐋 𝐇𝐄𝐑𝐄 𝐀𝐔𝐓𝐎 𝐁𝐑𝐎𝐀𝐃𝐂𝐀𝐒𝐓 𝐌𝐄𝐒𝐒𝐀𝐆𝐄 𝐖𝐇𝐈𝐂𝐇 𝐖𝐈𝐋𝐋 𝐁𝐄 𝐀𝐔𝐓𝐎 𝐁𝐑𝐎𝐀𝐃𝐂𝐀𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐃 𝐓𝐖𝐈𝐂𝐄 𝐈𝐍 𝐀 𝐃𝐀𝐘. ( 𝐀𝐍𝐘 𝐓𝐘𝐏𝐄 𝐎𝐅 𝐌𝐄𝐒𝐒𝐀𝐆𝐄 𝐘𝐎𝐔 𝐂𝐀𝐍 𝐂𝐎𝐏𝐘 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐏𝐀𝐒𝐓𝐄 𝐇𝐄𝐑𝐄 )

TOKEN_ALLOW.description: Fill 'True' if you want to use Token data for play youtube songs, Fill 'False' to use cookies (song will play by cookies)

TOKEN_DATA.description: Fill here token data if you have otherwise ignore this and use cookies method for play youtube songs

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: If you dont know this, Leave as it is
